name: Whatnot
headline: Whatnot is the largest livestream shopping platform in the U.S.
description: Whatnot is the largest livestream shopping platform in the U.S., connecting buyers and sellers in real-time across any category – from collectibles like trading cards to comics, fashion, sneakers, and more.

generated_description:
Whatnot is making waves as the largest livestream shopping platform in the U.S., and it’s not just another marketplace — it’s a vibrant community. Founded in 2019 and hailing from Los Angeles, California, Whatnot operates under the innovative umbrella of Y Combinator’s Batch W20. With a team of 400 passionate employees, they’re pushing boundaries in the e-commerce landscape.

At its core, Whatnot connects buyers and sellers in real-time, facilitating transactions across a plethora of categories, from collectible trading cards and comics to fashion and sneakers. If you've ever scrolled through your feed and found yourself captivated by a live auction, there's a good chance you'd come across Whatnot’s engaging shows, where enthusiasts can buy, sell, and discover products they love. 

The platform promises an enjoyable shopping experience while ensuring safety and trust. Every seller is vetted, and Whatnot has a buyer protection policy, meaning you can shop with peace of mind, knowing they’ve got your back if something goes awry.

Dalton Caldwell serves as the Group Partner, steering the ship as the company navigates the fast-paced world of online shopping. Looking ahead, Whatnot is well-positioned to dominate livestream shopping with its focus on building a community around commerce.

The company continues to expand its offerings, encouraging users to jump onto the platform — whether you want to buy something unique, sell your own items, or just enjoy the vibe of a live shopping event. Interested? You can learn more and sign up on their website [here](https://www.whatnot.com).

In summary, Whatnot is not just about selling and buying; it's about bringing together people with shared interests in a dynamic, real-time environment that redefines the shopping experience. If you haven’t checked it out yet, you might just want to add it to your to-do list.
